attributes.action: treaty initiated by Hwa Chi Lin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi,

Treaty initiated by Singapore Hwa Chi Lin and being agreed by German Officers in Germany.

MI5 should already know the content of it.

The treaty must be cancealed, Mr. Gordon Brown must order Singapore Hwa Chi Lin to canceal the treaty in Germany. 

England on its single side can not canceal the treaty.

Regards

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
